description: Developed and optimized highly scalable and robust websites for Pfizer, ensuring seamless deployment across US and Canada markets. Led on/offboarding processes and collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-priority projects while maintaining quality. Mentored junior developers to foster collaboration and knowledge sharing.
Developed and optimized .NET applications using C#, ASP.NET MVC, and SQL to improve efficiency and data accuracy. Collaborated on high-quality solutions following best practices.
